title: The most aggressive spider societies are not always the ones that flourish

title_detail.value: The most aggressive spider societies are not always the ones that flourish

summary: Evolutionary biologists who study the social lives and behavior of colony spiders -- some of which are docile, others aggressive -- have found that the success of their cooperative societies depend on their neighbors.

summary_detail.value: Evolutionary biologists who study the social lives and behavior of colony spiders -- some of which are docile, others aggressive -- have found that the success of their cooperative societies depend on their neighbors.
